question: Which security force celebrated its 33rd Raising Day on October 16?
explanation:
The National Security Guard celebrated its 33rd Raising Day recently. The commandos demonstrated their Ninja style counter terrorism techniques during the celebrations at NSG campus in Manesar.
The function was attended by the Vice President Venkaiah Naidu. The NSG was formed in 1984 after the assassination of the then Prime Minister Indira Gandhi specially to combat terrorism.
